verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Command|strong="H6680"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w cast|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w leper|strong="H6879"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* whosoever hath \w an|strong="H4480"\w* issue \w of|strong="H1121"\w* seed, \w or|strong="H4480"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2931"\w* \w by|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w dead|strong="H5315"\w*:

Whether \w it|strong="H5704"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H2145"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w woman|strong="H5347"\w*, \w cast|strong="H7971"\w* ye \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w of|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, lest \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w defile|strong="H2930"\w* \w it|strong="H5704"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w cast|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* without \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.
\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Say|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* \w committed|strong="H4603"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* wont \w to|strong="H0413"\w* commit, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* negligence \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* transgressed \w the|strong="H3605"\w* commandment \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* offended,

\w They|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w confess|strong="H3034"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w restore|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* principal \w itself|strong="H6213"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w part|strong="H5921"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w above|strong="H5921"\w*, \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2403"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* receive \w it|strong="H0518"\w*, \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w give|strong="H7725"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w priest’s|strong="H3548"\w*, \w besides|strong="H0905"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* offered \w for|strong="H5921"\w* expiation, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w an|strong="H0376"\w* atoning sacrifice.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* firstfruits \w also|strong="H3478"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w*, \w belong|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3548"\w* whatsoever \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w offered|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w* \w by|strong="H1961"\w* \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* hands \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w*.
\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w whose|strong="H1121"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* \w gone|strong="H7847"\w* \w astray|strong="H7847"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* contemning \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*,

\w Shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w slept|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w another|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w her|strong="H7901"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* discover \w it|strong="H1931"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* adultery \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w secret|strong="H5956"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* proved \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w*, \w because|strong="H2233"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w found|strong="H0369"\w* \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* adultery:

\w If|strong="H0176"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w jealousy|strong="H7068"\w* stir \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* husband \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w either|strong="H0176"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* charged \w with|strong="H5921"\w* false suspicion,

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w offer|strong="H5414"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* oblation \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tenth|strong="H6224"\w* \w part|strong="H1931"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w measure|strong="H0374"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w barley|strong="H8184"\w* \w meal|strong="H4503"\w*: \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w pour|strong="H3332"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w thereon|strong="H5921"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w frankincense|strong="H3828"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H4503"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w jealousy|strong="H7068"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* oblation searching \w out|strong="H3332"\w* adultery.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w therefore|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w it|strong="H7126"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w set|strong="H5975"\w* \w it|strong="H7126"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w earthen|strong="H2789"\w* \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w cast|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* little \w earth|strong="H6083"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* pavement \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* uncover \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w*, \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H4503"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w remembrance|strong="H2146"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* oblation \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w jealousy|strong="H7068"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w himself|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w hold|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* most \w bitter|strong="H4751"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, whereon \w he|strong="H1931"\w* hath heaped \w curses|strong="H0779"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* execration.

\w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w adjure|strong="H7650"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w another|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w slept|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* thou \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* defiled \w by|strong="H0413"\w* forsaking thy \w husband’s|strong="H0376"\w* \w bed|strong="H7901"\w*, \w these|strong="H0428"\w* most \w bitter|strong="H4751"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w which|strong="H4325"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* heaped \w curses|strong="H0779"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* hurt thee.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast \w gone|strong="H7847"\w* \w aside|strong="H1107"\w* \w from|strong="H0376"\w* thy \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* art \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* hast lain \w with|strong="H0376"\w* \w another|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*:

\w These|strong="H5971"\w* \w curses|strong="H0423"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* light \w upon|strong="H0802"\w* thee: \w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w curse|strong="H0423"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* example \w for|strong="H3068"\w* all \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w thigh|strong="H3409"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w rot|strong="H5307"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w belly|strong="H0990"\w* \w swell|strong="H6639"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w burst|strong="H5307"\w* asunder.

Let \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* thy \w belly|strong="H0990"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w may|strong="H4325"\w* thy \w womb|strong="H0990"\w* \w swell|strong="H6638"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* thy \w thigh|strong="H3409"\w* \w rot|strong="H5307"\w*. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w shall|strong="H0802"\w* \w answer|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Amen|strong="H0543"\w*, \w amen|strong="H0543"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w write|strong="H3789"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w curses|strong="H0423"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H3789"\w* \w book|strong="H5612"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* wash \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w out|strong="H0413"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* most \w bitter|strong="H4751"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, \w upon|strong="H0413"\w* \w which|strong="H4325"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* hath heaped \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w curses|strong="H0423"\w*,

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w shall|strong="H0802"\w* \w give|strong="H8248"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w her|strong="H0802"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w drink|strong="H8248"\w*. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H0935"\w* \w she|strong="H8248"\w* hath \w drunk|strong="H8248"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w up|strong="H0935"\w*,

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H4503"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w jealousy|strong="H7068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* elevate \w it|strong="H7126"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w put|strong="H3947"\w* \w it|strong="H7126"\w* \w upon|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*: \w yet|strong="H3068"\w* \w so|strong="H3947"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w first|strong="H6440"\w*,

\w To|strong="H4325"\w* \w take|strong="H7061"\w* \w a|strong="H4480"\w* \w handful|strong="H7061"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H4503"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w that|strong="H4480"\w* \w which|strong="H4325"\w* \w is|strong="H4325"\w* \w offered|strong="H6999"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* \w it|strong="H0310"\w* \w upon|strong="H0802"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*: \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w so|strong="H4480"\w* \w give|strong="H8248"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w most|strong="H4480"\w* bitter \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w to|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w to|strong="H4325"\w* \w drink|strong="H8248"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w she|strong="H0518"\w* hath \w drunk|strong="H8248"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w she|strong="H0518"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w having|strong="H1961"\w* despised \w her|strong="H0802"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* guilty \w of|strong="H0376"\w* adultery, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* malediction \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w through|strong="H7130"\w* \w her|strong="H0802"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w her|strong="H0802"\w* \w belly|strong="H0990"\w* swelling, \w her|strong="H0802"\w* \w thigh|strong="H3409"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w rot|strong="H5307"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w curse|strong="H0779"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* example \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w*, \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* hurt, \w and|strong="H0802"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* bear \w children|strong="H2233"\w*.

\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w jealousy|strong="H7068"\w*. \w If|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* hath \w gone|strong="H7847"\w* \w aside|strong="H7847"\w* \w from|strong="H0376"\w* \w her|strong="H0802"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w*,

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* stirred \w up|strong="H5975"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w jealousy|strong="H7068"\w* bring \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w here|strong="H2063"\w* written:
